Name: team_has_scrum_master
Description: A team must be supported by a Scrum Master

Name: worker_availability_threshold
Description: An individual worker's availability must be at least 70%

Name: feature_high_priority
Description: The feature must have a 'High' or 'Critical' priority

Name: blocker_is_resolved
Description: The blocker must have a status of 'Resolved'

Name: sprint_is_active
Description: The sprint must have an 'Active' status

Name: story_has_acceptance_criteria
Description: A user story must have defined acceptance criteria

Name: task_is_dev_type
Description: The task must be of type 'Development'

Name: project_is_running
Description: The project status must be 'In Progress'

Name: snapshot_test_passed
Description: The development snapshot must have a test status of 'Passed'

Name: review_has_min_attendees
Description: The sprint review must have at least 3 attendees
